ui.panel.config.zha.change_channel_dialo: Zigbee channel migration is an experimental feature and relies on devices on your network to support it. Device support for this feature varies and only a portion of your network may end up migrating! It may take up to an hour for changes to propagate to all devices.

Change your Zigbee channel only after you have eliminated all other sources of 2.4GHz interference by using a USB extension cable and moving your coordinator away from USB 3.0 devices and ports, SSDs, 2.4GHz WiFi networks on the same channel, motherboards, and so on.

It is recommended to use the "Smart" option once your environment is optimized as opposed to manually choosing a channel, as it picks the best channel for you after scanning all Zigbee channels. This does not configure ZHA to automatically change channels in the future, it only changes the channel a single time.
